dublin_core.dcvalue: By combining teleconferencing tele presence and Virtual Reality the Tele Immersive environment enables master surgeons to teach residents in remote locations The design and implementation of a Tele Immersive medical educational environment Teledu is presented in this paper Teledu defines a set of Tele Immersive user interfaces for medical education In addition an Application Programming Interface API is provided so that developers can easily develop different applications with different requirements in this environment With the help of this API programmers only need to design a plug in to load their application specific data set The plug in is an object oriented data set loader Methods for rendering handling and interacting with the data set for each application can be programmed in the plug in The environment has a teacher mode and a student mode The teacher and the students can interact with the same medical models point gesture converse and see each other
Studies in health technology and informatics
